subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Agriculture and Farming
lead_paragraph: A 5,000-square-foot area on the ballpark’s third-base side has been providing fresh produce to its flagship restaurant, concessionaires and nearby eateries.
snippet: A 5,000-square-foot area on the ballpark’s third-base side has been providing fresh produce to its flagship restaurant, concessionaires and nearby eateries.
